name: Westwood Studios
description: Famed for creating influential titles in the RTS genre including the Command & Conquer series and entries in the Dune RTS series.

name: Maxis Emeryville
description: Revolutionized simulation games in the 90s and early 2000s with the SimCity and Sims series.

name: Pandemic Studios
description: Developed the first two entries in the Star Wars: Battlefront series, first two entries in the Destroy All Humans! series, and created the Mercenaries Sage series.

name: Visceral Games
description: An EA founded studio that was best known for creating the Dead Space series.
